metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare for Government | FedRAMP Moderate Authorized
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare for Government is a suite of FedRAMP Authorized products that provide security, performance, and reliability for United States government agencies and organizations.

psaBanner.text: Cloudflare for Government is authorized at FedRAMP Moderate Level to secure cloud products and services.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare for Government
relatedBlades.subtitle: Protect agency employees and improve citizen services
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare for Government is our suite of services for US government and public sector agencies, delivered from our global, highly resilient cloud network with built-in security and performance.

relatedBlades.title: Security and performance for government agencies
relatedBlades.copy:
The Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program ("FedRAMP") is a US-government-wide program that provides a standardized approach to security assessment, authorization, and continuous monitoring for cloud products and services. 

Cloudflare for Government has achieved FedRAMP Moderate Authorization. This certification demonstrates Cloudflare's continued commitment to customer trust and our ability to secure and protect public sector organizations.

relatedBlades.title: Zero Trust for government agencies
relatedBlades.copy:
[Cloudflare Access](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/access/ "Cloudflare Access") creates secure boundaries for applications by allowing access to resources after verifying identity, context, and policy adherence for each specific request.

[Browser Isolation](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/browser-isolation/ "Browser Isolation") provides a fast and reliable solution for remote browsing by running all browser code in the cloud.

[Cloudflare Gateway](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/gateway/ "Cloudflare Gateway") protects users and data by inspecting user traffic, filtering and blocking malicious content, and identifying compromised devices.

relatedBlades.title: Network services for government agencies
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare for Government can replace your legacy WAN architecture with Cloudflare's [Magic WAN](https://www.cloudflare.com/magic-wan/ "Magic WAN"), which provides expansive connectivity, cloud-based security, performance and control.

[Magic Transit](https://www.cloudflare.com/magic-transit/ "Magic Transit") can protect your websites, applications, and network.

[Network Interconnect](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-interconnect/ "Network Interconnect") enables you to directly connect your on-premises networks to Cloudflare for Government.

relatedBlades.title: Application services for government agencies
relatedBlades.copy:
[Web Application Firewall](https://www.cloudflare.com/waf/ "Web Application Firewall") with API protection provides an intelligent, integrated and scalable solution to protect your critical web applications.

[Rate Limiting](https://www.cloudflare.com/rate-limiting/ "Rate Limiting") protects against denial of service attacks, brute force login attempts, and other abusive behavior that targets the application layer.

[Load Balancing](https://www.cloudflare.com/load-balancing/ "Load Balancing") improves application performance and availability by steering traffic from unhealthy origin servers and dynamically distributing it to the most available and responsive server pools.

[Bot Management](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/bot-management/ "Bot Management") manages good and bad bots in real-time. Helps prevent credential stuffing, content scraping, content spam, inventory hoarding, credit card stuffing and application DDoS.

[Content Delivery Network (CDN)](https://www.cloudflare.com/cdn/ "Content Delivery Network (CDN)") provides ultra-fast static and dynamic content delivery over our global edge.

relatedBlades.title: Developer platform for serverless applications
relatedBlades.copy:
[Cloudflare Workers](https://workers.cloudflare.com/ "Workers") provides a serverless execution environment that allows you to create entirely new applications or augment existing ones without configuring or maintaining infrastructure.

[Cloudflare Workers KV](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/workers-kv/ "Workers KV") is a global, low-latency, key-value data store. It supports exceptionally high read volumes with low-latency, making it possible to build highly dynamic APIs and websites which respond as quickly as a cached static file would.
